headline: PRESSURE GROWING TO COVER THE COST OF BIRTH CONTROL
snippet: Seizing upon the celebrity of the male impotency pill Viagra, family planning groups are pressing lawmakers in Congress and the states on a long-ignored demand that employers cover the costs of contraception as a health benefit. They are confronting...

headline: House Approves a Measure For Coverage of Birth Control
snippet: Despite the opposition of Republican leaders, the House tonight approved a measure requiring Federal health plans to cover prescription contraceptives like birth-control pills for Federal employees.    And to the distress of the Clinton...

headline: Connecticut Lawmakers Try Again to Force Health Insurers to Pay for Birth Control
snippet: Legislative leaders from both parties said today that they were determined to pass a bill that would require all insurance companies to cover the cost of prescription birth control, an expense that many women now pay out of their own pockets.    Over...
